name: open-responses
description: CLI for setting up a self-hosted alternative to OpenAI's Responses API

scripts.build:all: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/open-responses-linux main.go && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/open-responses-macos main.go && GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/open-responses-win.exe main.go

author: Julep AI
